channel.title: [PI] Maximum EXP 200m -NVM MANAGED TO FIX
channel.description:
[s]Hey, I'm having problems with a check that checks for maximum exp. I need help adding a check that prevents you from getting 200m exp. How do I do this?
Alright, so I managed to add a check by going to PlayerAssistant.java And then adding [/s][code]if(c.playerXP[skill] < 200000000){ c.playerXP[skill] += amount; }[/code] under the [code]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){[/code]
[s]But let's say I was to change my Agility exp to 199,999,999 And then do the Agility course.. My exp is then 200,197,999. Then it doesn't go any farther because of my check. How do I do so it stops at 200mil?[/s]
Nvm managed to fix.

item.title: [PI] Maximum EXP 200m -NVM MANAGED TO FIX
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[s]Hey, I’m having problems with a check that checks for maximum exp.
I need help adding a check that prevents you from getting 200m exp.
How do I do this?

Alright, so I managed to add a check by going to PlayerAssistant.java
And then adding [/s]if(c.playerXP[skill] < 200000000){ c.playerXP[skill] += amount; }
under the public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){

But let’s say I was to change my Agility exp to 199,999,999
And then do the Agility course… My exp is then 200,197,999.
Then it doesn’t go any farther because of my check.
How do I do so it stops at 200mil?

Nvm managed to fix.

Read full topic
